sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(7 \), \(15 \), \(20 \), and \(27 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $7 + z $, $15 + z $, $20 + z $, $27 + z $ are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + z }{15 + z } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + z }{27 + z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (7 + z )(27 + z ) = (15 + z )(20 + z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 189 + z (\input[s2v1]{} ) + z ^2 = 300 + z (\input[s2v2]{} ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (34 - 35 ) = 300 - 189 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{300 - 189 }{34 - 35 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{-111 }{1 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [7, 20], "text": "$$\text{Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get}\[ \frac{7 + z }{15 + z } = \frac{20 + z }{27 + z }\]$$"}, {"data": [34, 35], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	z = \frac{300 - 189 }{34 - 35 }
\]"}, {"data": [111, -1], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as \[z= \frac{-111 }{1 }\] "}]
